headline: Brex to accept stablecoins as payment
summary: The card issuer sees stablecoin payments as a key product differentiator, with more companies adopting cryptocurrency for finance functions.

headline: Cracking The PayPal Case
summary: PayPal is undergoing significant changes, including a shift to a balance sheet-light model and new international expansion initiatives. Read my analysis of PYPL stock here.
